title: What servers have the Refer a Friend program enabled?  NA, EUW, EUNE, TR and BR.
body:
There was a post the other week saying OCE got the new RAF? but it didnt? the site was working for OC for a little while...but now i cant find my link nor any way to get to RAF....

whats going on? take everything away from OCE and then tell us we get this 1 thing back....and then remove it again anyway? i have TONS AND TONS of RAFs from season 1 and some made during the RAF 2.0....but i get nothing and neither does anyone else on OCE?

replies.body:
Hi,

Thanks for reporting this.  I'll look into why we haven't got a link up to the Bring a Mate (RAF) program on our main site.  You can find it by going to http://rewards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/

Cheers,
Mindstar
